website_summaries.verdict: There are higher quality dog houses on the market for a lower price but perhaps none that would look better in your living room.
pros: Stands out from the rest for its combined indoor and outdoor use
cons: Stairs are small and tend to break

customer_reviews.title: It was very easy to assemble and sits in our living room
customer_reviews.text: Our little pup loves her house....and so does everyone who sees it! It was very easy to assemble and sits in our living room. We fashioned a "gate" on the front and did a couple of other modifications to use in place of a crate.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley Smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: After reading many reviews and seeing customer images I purchased this and the pet gear ramp! My dog already loves it and I just put it together!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Batten

customer_reviews.title: Fun - just ordered my second one - not for outside
customer_reviews.text: Reading some of the negative reviews makes me wonder about the remarks on outdoor use. Really? You keep your dog outside. That is just wrong. This is a indoor playhouse, fortress. I bought the Pet Gear Ramp 28 x 16 x 16 size and left the stair off. It is perfect height for my front window and my dogs live up there and love it. Here is the ramp that fits it perfectly. These stairs also fit. I posted a picture with the stairs now too. (taken 08/19/2016) As you can see my little pack has grown.
customer_reviews.author: Anne MarieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Love❤️️
customer_reviews.text: Love ours. Got it as a gift from my sister and she decorated and painted it ! Max loves it
customer_reviews.author: Kate Ardner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect window perch!
customer_reviews.text: This little perch is adorable!!! Initially bought it for our 10 lb toy fox terrier but she shares it with our 40 pound French/Boston! Husband added height with 3-4 inch 1x1's - see pics.
customer_reviews.author: polar

customer_reviews.title: Cute Doghouse, Stairs are not practical
customer_reviews.text: I got this house for my Italian Greyhound (16 lbs) and we use it indoors. It was pretty easy to assemble, my boyfriend and I put it together in about 20 minutes. We decided to paint it and it looks great! The inside of the house is pretty roomy, unfortunately the opening is so small in the front Pongo is scared to go in. I put his bed on top, and he likes to jump up there and sleep. The stairs are cute but not functional. I might take them off and replace them with another set of dog steps. I would only recommend this dog house for small, short dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Kalyn

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this doghouse for awhile and my 3 little ones love it! I painted it to match my entertainment center and was easy to paint! They use it everyday and fight over who gets to be "inside" the house lol. I only have my lil boy prince inside when I took the pic. They don't use the stairs so I put them up there now and then,.. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect except the stairs!
customer_reviews.text: The house is of great quality, very sturdy and perfect size for my minpin (he is a small boy, about 12lbs., foot high, foot long). The stairs sadly did not work out for us either, they are too narrow (narrower than the dog's chest so he would not be able to use them at all given his paws are set wider than the steps) and too steep (the angle is pretty crazy as I was trying to show Snoopy how to climb down, total tumble disaster. However the ramp mentioned by one of the awesome reviewers works out perfectly :)
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: Fort McPuppers
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a way to help my pup get up to the bed easier, but I have a feeling she'll be ditching us for her fortress soon enough! Took no time to put together, and I wrapped some fabric around the stairs to make it easier for her to get up and down. Day 1, and I'm already a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Lizanne Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Works for cats as well!!  My cat will stay warmer this winter.
customer_reviews.text: My "kitty" house arrived!! Yeah, this will work for my cat just perfectly. It arrived today, and I already have it together. Took me about 20 minutes from start to finish after taking the components out of the packaging. I also purchased bowl warmers, which will go on top, and a self heating pad - all of which I got here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Malone

customer_reviews.title: Toby's feeling com.fy
customer_reviews.text: The steps were to small for my Chihuahua, other than that the quality was good, packaged well, great price and well constructed, we will be removing the steps and use a dog ramp.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 month old Shih Tzu absolutely loves her fortress ! She sleeps comfortably in the bottom room, and uses the terrace to play with her teething toys . For the price, I was surprised to find how well made and sturdy the wood was, although I used wood glue to seal all the joints as suggested by other reviewers . In addition, I ditched the stairs in favor of Solvit pupSTEPS which fit perfectly onto the structure! The smell of fresh cedar was a pleasant surprise.
customer_reviews.author: KE

customer_reviews.title: Be aware. Cheap materials.
customer_reviews.text: The novelty of the item is there. Had some hopes seeing as it was half off practically, but the reason it's half off is most likely because of how cheap the materials are. When installing it together the wood warped of the bottom board. Had to glue several pieces back when they snapped just during installation. I would return to get my 60 dollars back, but it's not even worth trying to unscrew everything and send it back. Maybe I received a defective I need that shouldn't have passed QC, but it wasn't worth it by any means.
customer_reviews.author: Sebatian Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor cat absolutely loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an outdoor cat who adopted my family by refusing to leave our front porch. She LOVES it. She lounges on what we call the "terrace" when it's warm outside and sleeps in the lower section when it's chilly - it's perfect for her. Unfortunately the product arrived with broken stairs, some splintering wood, several scratches, etc. I'm not sure if that speaks to the quality of the product or if the seller is to blame for poor packaging. I fixed the stairs with gorilla glue and pulled the splintering pieces to avoid her hurting herself.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Still need a better ladder!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my TFT! It’s absolutley does what we got it for. It gets her high enough ware she can have a fantastic view out the window while she checks out life or naps in the sun. The stairs that it comes with did not work for us (which I new before I ordered) so I purchased a set of something more like three/four step that are more like real steps. Not that goofy contraption they got going.
customer_reviews.author: Weeny

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Get ready for a handful of splinters. Pieces didn’t fit properly, screw holes poorly opened. The front of the house showed up damaged. Total disaster to unpack. Not sure how I would be able to send it back. Update: The company also didn’t bother to contact me after this feedback.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R

customer_reviews.title: Nice dog house easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: I will give this product 8 out of 10 stars for quality, there were small places in the wood that had been patched with a very light wood or filler that was noticeable These patches should have been out of Cedar or colored to match a little better, but it is just a dog house. The assembly was super easy and the looks are great
customer_reviews.author: Stephen T.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice pet house
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pet house! It was a Christmas present for my doggy. Easy to assemble. My dog figured out right away that she had to relocate from my bed to her own new dwelling. She is a pug size.
customer_reviews.author: Tantressa Vega

customer_reviews.title: Happy momma:-)
customer_reviews.text: I think he's happy!! Went ahead and purchased a ramp. We've tried stairs in the past, and he wouldn't go up or dwn. So the ramp he's using with no problems. The house is a lot smaller than I expected, but that's good because it doesn't take up a lot of space in your room. All in all I would recommend. Bud is happy so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona

customer_reviews.title: I bought this with the ramp as was recommended by other reviewers and it is perfect
customer_reviews.text: Our dog absolutely loves this. I bought this with the ramp as was recommended by other reviewers and it is perfect. He was a little scared of the ramp at first, but once he got the hang of it, he loves looking out by the window. We bought this because I was trying to find something he can climb on to be able to look out the window. The ladder that comes with the house are a bit too narrow; the ramp is great. If it helps, we have a 13 lb Jack Russell Terrier. I bought this for indoor use.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: ... of the three-to-five star review of this product are pretty accurate! I did get a few splinters putting ...
customer_reviews.text: All of the three-to-five star review of this product are pretty accurate! I did get a few splinters putting it together, and the stairs are somewhat narrow (luckily our dog is a jumper). But overall, this is the most amazing little dog house! Our dog and cat both adore it. Monty (cat) prefers the top shelf and spends hours staring out the window. I would be surprised to find another little indoor pet house that is as cute and useful as this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Borden

customer_reviews.title: Only one criticism...
customer_reviews.text: She LOVES it and so does her grand-mu-ma! She refuses to use the stairs however, they are too narrow for her, so she just uses my storage stool to jump in and out of the balcony lol. Can anyone provide me with the telephone number at the bottom of the instructions? I accidently wrapped them up in the make shift base I created for her. I'd like to purchase more materials to fashion a banister, maybe that will help her use the steps more comfortably. But overall, the price is right!
customer_reviews.author: DarlingNikkiGATop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: BIG TIME RIP OFF!! CHEAP CHEAP CHEAP
customer_reviews.text: This was horrible!!! It was used. the wood was plywood and super cheap. the stairs are so tiny they look fake, I bought this 3 days ago and it already broke, I regret it. The worst item I have ever bought. I wished I would of listen to the other reviews, BIG TIME RIP OFF !!!
customer_reviews.author: Idaly Acevedo

customer_reviews.title: NOT HAPPY at ALL
customer_reviews.text: NOT HAPPY at ALL! I wanted to believe that the reviews I read were merely buyers remorse, except they are spot on! The house is way to small for my very small Shih Tzu, the stairs are very dangerous. I would need to purchase a new stairway up just for the unit to be usable. What is more the unit is unstable (un-leveled ) it rocks from side to side. A total waste of my money. My puppy will not even go near it!
customer_reviews.author: DrMk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Not too heavy so I would move it from the front to back yard every now and then. Easy to assemble once the instructions are followed. My pomeranian absolutely loves it. He loves small spaces of his own and he also like looking out from any window or balcony so this was his own little balcony. He loves it. Curls up inside whenever it rains and there's thunder. The first step did break off though.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly S.

customer_reviews.title: My dogs loved it. It's very sturdy but the ladder is ...
customer_reviews.text: My dogs loved it. It's very sturdy but the ladder is a little too small for my dogs just because they're too clumsy to use a tiny ladder. So I put my own doggy ramp up and it worked perfectly! They love it because it's the same height as our window so they can finally look out without having to just jump up constantly to see. I'll have to find the perfect padding to go inside of the bottom house part since it didn't come with but they sure do love it, they bake in the sun during the day since we open the curtains up for them while laying on their little deck on top
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Our very lucky (and big) cat used to be a stray and we decided to buy this very fancy pet house in order of giving her a shelter.. She used to live under a tree so everybody discouraged us to invest money on such a thing. They said a stray cat would never get in. They were all wrong! No more wet cat in front of our window, breaking our heart! This is her shelter and is not water proof so we keep it at the porch. We were skeptical, but it worked out perfectly instead! Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: great little dog house for the price
customer_reviews.text: great little dog house for the price, I ended up getting 2 and modified them to work for my 2 dogs
customer_reviews.author: GAGA

customer_reviews.title: Fun Station for pets...
customer_reviews.text: We were pleasantly surprised that this pet 'house' was easy to put together and finished looking enough to function as an indoor place for our two cavaliers to hang out. If they squeeze, they can both get in the lower level, but it doesn't look comfortable for them. The upper level appeals to our younger canine, since the steps are tightly place together (maybe more designed for a cat?) and our older dog seems to find them awkward. This has been a fun project for our kiddos to find & build for 'their' dogs. Worth the money, if you shop for a fair price. Online, this item ranges from $50-$200... definitely worth shopping around. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Love It, so does the dog
customer_reviews.text: Once it airs out a little (strong cedar smell) its a great doghouse. I have a poddle, jack russel mix and he fits nicely in the doghouse. I took anothers review about adding the pet ramp insteadbof the stairs and I would definately go that route. The stairs may be a little hard for your dog to navigate. Waiting for the weather to improve so he can use this outside.
customer_reviews.author: DigiKiwamTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, better than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: This came in 2 days! You will need a drill though because some of the holes weren't done..BUT, let me tell you how awesome this house it. First of all it is really cedar, I assumed it was some cheap material. It smelled great! I got it for my cat so the size was great. I put his food/water bowls on top. He hasn't ventured inside yet though. It is really cute. I have it on my front porch. It works great for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Barber

customer_reviews.title: No customer service for repair request
customer_reviews.text: This adorable dog house was really easy to put together, but it took a few tries to understand how the walls fit. Once I figured that out, the rest was a cinch. The little ladder was splintered and the 2 bottom steps smashed. I have communicated to the seller several times to request a replacement ladder, but so fat I have not gotten any response. Next week I will go to the hardware store and build a new ladder from scratch. I like the dog house but sadly my dog shuns it. I hope he will become more interested in time. I hide treats in and on it to get him interested in it.
customer_reviews.author: Bonita J. Woods

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Build, Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together; took me about an hour with easy-to-read instructions. Beautiful. It has no finish, but I love the color of the wood. Will add a nautical waterproof finish so that it can withstand the Chicago weather. Dogs were hesitant at first sight of this strange new object, but they seem to be enjoying it now. Totally worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Nikolai

customer_reviews.title: Quality of product is good but the stairs can break off easily due to ...
customer_reviews.text: Product is not made for dogs at all. Company is misrepresenting that this product can be used by a dog. I have three small dogs and none of them are able to do the steps nor can they jump up to the top to sit up there as picture shows. Quality of product is good but the stairs can break off easily due to the way they attach to the body of the bed. Disappointed!!!! Great for a cat however!
customer_reviews.author: jojo

customer_reviews.title: Great if you have a Deputy Dog!
customer_reviews.text: If you have a little pup that would like to look out the the window on this "watch post" and defend your honor, then this is great! Perfect height, decent cedar.
customer_reviews.author: Heather O'D

customer_reviews.title: Cheap shotty wood used.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a young rescued kitten. While taking it out of the box I found many of the small pieces were splintered and split. When I tried to put the needed screws in it to add the second level balcony and stairs they completely broke into many splintered pieces. It ended up being a simple one level square box. Not happy with the cheap, bad wood. I needed it for my sweet little rescue or I would have returned back to the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Albright

customer_reviews.title: Fair
customer_reviews.text: Assembling is easy but some screws don't fit Like the ones for the fence! Also the material is not real wood, its like balse. Tried putting nails to replace the screws that didn't work in the fence but is so fragile that it broke a little. I tried my best not to break it any more. I sanded it and painted it. Stair steps are too short would only work for a miniature dog. My dogs are 12 lb and they felt. I had to buy another set of stairs. Still waiting for it to arrive. Overall I like it and is perfect for my babies. And makes my living room look organized and cool. They LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: DSL

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it!
customer_reviews.text: Lost a star because the fencing at the top is very unstable. Everything needed a little tweaking to be right. BUT my cat loves it and that's all that matters. The staircase is very narrow my cats just jump. I was hoping the dog would use it but shes more medium (corgi)
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Sander

customer_reviews.title: Stairs are too steep!
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction, nice unit, well built. Only complaint, and it seems to be the complaint of the others---the DOG DOESN'T USE IT!! The reason he doesn't use it is because the stairs are too steep. We removed them and added some other non-stylish stairs, and he USES IT. Defeats the purpose. If you guys can come up with some better stairs to attach, with a more gradual slope, that would be awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Bohdan Cole

customer_reviews.title: Made well!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my small dogs. It’s build surprisingly well! Very nice wood too! Easy to put together! Very durable wood! My cats ended up liking it more than my dogs after i adding the beds in and on top! Sharing is caring!
customer_reviews.author: Missy!

customer_reviews.title: Great House for a Cat
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to put on my porch for the stray cat that adopted us. It was much colder than normal this winter in CA and I was worried she needed a better shelter. Assembled it quickly and placed it on my covered porch and she loves it! She's a long-haired cat, so occasionally she gets too warm, mostly during the day. At night she's been sleeping inside it and during the day she likes to sleep on the roof. It's perfect for her and I'm so glad I purchased it. It's also attractive enough that I don't mind it being on my porch. It looks very cute.
customer_reviews.author: SGZ

customer_reviews.title: Nice house
customer_reviews.text: I liked it but my Boston didn't. The steps were too narrow for him but it was nice to look at it. I tried to give him time to warm up to it but he just would not go to the top and refused to go inside. I just think it is a personality thing for our dog, not the house. He is not a fan of walls.
customer_reviews.author: Imcega

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to put together and stay in tact
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to put together and stay in tact... puppy does not like, smell too... steps , don't bother with...sitting in a corner waiting to donate to someone
customer_reviews.author: GG58

customer_reviews.title: Super cute for a xsmall/small dog
customer_reviews.text: Super cute for a xsmall/small dog! Although I've only had it a few weeks and my dog hates it, I think she will grow to love it. It looks much more cute in my master bedroom, compared to the hot pink wire kennel we had before (which my dog absolutely loved). The smell of wood is pretty strong in the nook, so you may want to air it out a few days before placing your dog in there. The stairs are much to far apart and narrow for my dog to use, but she can easily jump down if I place her in the bed on top.
customer_reviews.author: Seattle_Mel

customer_reviews.title: Nice but came broken
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is so adorable!! But upon putting the home together we noticed our ladder was broken. Pretty bummed out because it was all built and nailed together. So check all pieces of wood before assembly
customer_reviews.author: Kassandra

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful “house” for fur babies
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely adorable. The dogs can look out the window while sitting on the top. Then there is a little house they can go in and lay down to rest. It is well built and attractive. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Beckie Goudy

customer_reviews.title: Item Listing Picture Misleading - Does NOT Include Green Padding
customer_reviews.text: Solid product but picture on listing is completely misleading if you do not look close enough. This listing DOES NOT include the green cushion. There were similar listings that did not picture the green padding for $20-$30 less. I should have looked closer at the description, but I assumed for the extra money you were getting the green padding. Besides the misleading pictures, the product seems well-made and smells of pungent cedar. If my dog doesn't end up liking this, I possibly might just use it in my shoes as a freshener (haha).
customer_reviews.author: Tony D.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I've had this for a while and I just love it! I attached a panel to the opening ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a while and I just love it! I attached a panel to the opening and this is now my doggy's crate. He's a 14 pound rat terrier and he loves it! The top is his feeding station, and all the cats love to look out the window from it. The wood is very very soft, so keep that in mind! This is not something that should be used outside. It's more decorative than functional but that's what I was looking for. We love it! It's so much more attractive in the house than that ugly metal crate we used to have!
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: love that its made of cedar , my dog loves it too ! i lined the inside with flannel , my only complaint is that it needs lined. as it is a bit splintery . My dog absolutely loves it , her own space , perfect for in a small apartment ! love love love this !
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the money !
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a good friends little dog . I was very impressed The little house is very well constructed and fairly easy to assemble with a Phillips head screwdriver and a out 15 to 20 minutes. The only thing I didn't like was the packaging material. There was some type of foam used in the packaging that ended up all over the living room . I would recommend putting it together outside if possible. Other than that I would highly recommend this for a small dog or a cat .
customer_reviews.author: Glen R.

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than it looks
customer_reviews.text: It looks great wheathered the winter in NY and still looks like it is just outta the box, very quick and easy to assemble, 15 mins if you dog doesn’t keep snatching the instructions, BUT the stairs to the top are to small for my very agile Cairns. This size is best for XS dogs, under 8 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Our dog loves this!!! Has Never used ...
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loves this!!! Has Never used the stairs but jumps from the couch to the top and sits in it/watches out the window for people!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cori

customer_reviews.title: Nice cat condo, with a view
customer_reviews.text: I am pleasantly surprised with how well it's made and designed. Looks like quality screws to hold this together. The wood seems to be quality cedar planking. I bought this for the cars and so far they love this. (Too small for the 110lb lab) Two small negatives. Not real clear which way sides should be facing and bedding not included. Bedding should be approx 17" x 17" for inside and 18.5" by 19.5" for top.
customer_reviews.author: Duane P

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Brandy our Bischon loves it now!! Took a few treats to get her comfortable going inside until she realized, It’s my house! She sleeps & naps in it but will not use the narrow stairs! She just jumps to the roof. My son thought it was easy to assemble. Took about 1/2 hr. Put some carpet remnants inside and on the deck.
customer_reviews.author: SpikeO

customer_reviews.title: Great product except for the too-small stairs
customer_reviews.text: I love (and my dog loves) this product. A nice place to perch and look out the window, or to hide. As other reviewers have noted, the included stairs are about useless. I have removed them and installed one of the other pet ramp products, which fits neatly in the spot where the stairs used to go.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B. Widdis

customer_reviews.title: House
customer_reviews.text: My dogs castle. She loves to look at the window and go inside when storming. Steps not functional for 12 lb show tzu.
customer_reviews.author: Larry P

customer_reviews.title: Product was brought as used but very good condition. There were cracks in a couple of ...
customer_reviews.text: Product was brought as used but very good condition. There were cracks in a couple of the boards and no assembly instructions. BUT overall I like the product and it is easy enough to figure out the assembly. I totally agree with several other comments. The stairs are totally useless. They are way too small and narrow for dogs to use. I put a set of dog stairs there instead and it works great. Overall, for the price I paid, I have been pleased. They don't use it that much but they use the deck as a bridge between the two couches.
customer_reviews.author: KSR

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Cat House/Napper
customer_reviews.text: This little house is really cute and my cats just love it with a cushy pad in the top and bottom. I cannot see any dog more than 15 to 20 pounds using it but I think it is great for cats. The materials used are not real substantial but I feel sufficient for cats or very small dogs. The stairs are definitely not functional and they don't get used but I think they are cute so I don't mind at all.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh A. TiehenTop Contributor: Cross-Stitch

customer_reviews.title: Dog house is really pretty, cute
customer_reviews.text: Dog house is really pretty, cute. However it arrived with one whole section of the railing busted. I fixed it but it took quite a while to get it right. I don't believe it's going to be very durable out in the weather. I have put protection stain on it. But, I do love it and I have had many comments about its cuteness.
customer_reviews.author: Clarice B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for senior owner and pet
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my mom, who could no longer lean over to feed her cat on the floor. The cat was also a senior, who could no longer jump up on any sort of table. This was the perfect solution! The stairs allowed for safe entry and exit of the top deck, and the product allowed her to feel she could still take care of the cat by herself.
customer_reviews.author: bsgkid

customer_reviews.title: Yup, just like the comments say....
customer_reviews.text: The picture is what you get. The size is what they say. The quality of work is nice. The thing about the broken step is true that I read on comments. wood glue fixes it. One ding on panel. Those two things I also think is in how its packaged.
customer_reviews.author: WhoWhatWhereWhy0123jilij321O

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this 'Doggy Fort'. My dogs always want to be in my lap at the computer so I placed this close enough that they feel they're with me. My two dogs are both 10lbs each with short legs, so I used a ramp instead of the included stairs.
customer_reviews.author: RCH

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, I just wish it held up a little better. Super cute and easy to assemble! The wood is soft and not very durable. I have a 4yr old son and a high energy doxie that have already broken the front of the top fence off. The stairs were broken the first week. Yes, part of it was our fault, but just be aware the materials are not very durable. We were able to reassemble everything with additional screws.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Roof for top dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog has found her way up to the roof top. However, the steps are not wide enough for a useable staircase. It was relatively easy to assemble. However, I'd suggest wood glue for the lattice balcony. One more issue was the smell of the wood. The cedar or wood stain was very offensive and permeated the basement for days. My dog has not found her way to the lower dog house yet. People who see this Merry Pet room with a view think it is very fancy. It is.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Lind-Schmitz

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and well made.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little house. Very simple to put together in about 5 min with a power screwdriver. Well made, not flimsy at all. I purchased two of these I love it so much. I sewed cushions to go in the top/bottom. My cats love it. One was for an outside cat so I did polyurethane it and use clear silicon to fill the gaps in the wood slats to make it waterproof. One I just have inside since when I was putting it together one of my cats immediately took it over, can't move it after that. Well worth the price, you won't regret it. Looks very expensive. It's also lightweight to move around which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: FullOLife

customer_reviews.title: Great, but . . .
customer_reviews.text: . . . haven't put it together yet since we plan to paint it in several areas first. it's pretty, we like it. it is light weight like several reviews stated, but we plan to use wood glue as part of the build process. needs airing out because the cedar smell is very strong right out of the box. the bottom step on the stairs was snapped in two but we are fixing it with glue and nails and are hoping it holds together. we would still recommend this item. UPDATE: Put it together, looks great!
customer_reviews.author: amazonismyfavestore

customer_reviews.title: Love this doggy home
customer_reviews.text: Love this doggy home, its super cute and cozy. I wanted to give it five stars but the bottom plate not as sturdy as I would want it to be, other than that I would totally recommend it because once its in place it stays in place. It comes out pretty easy once you pick up the house. I guess it would make it easy for cleaning. My small Yorkie loves it! Glad I purchased this item
customer_reviews.author: Sijara

customer_reviews.title: Cutest Stylish Doghouse
customer_reviews.text: Dog house is perfect for small size dog. I was very concerned that it was going to be too small, but it is perfect. I put a small throw pillow in the balcony and my dog simply loves it. Took her a while to get used of the stairs, now she handles it like a pro. The only downside is the rails are not secured on the doghouse, very surprised, not a major deal, but surprised at how the other pieces fit so well, but this piece just 'sits' there. I recommend this purchase. Very easy to put together, very sturdy, very stylish, not the 'typical' doghouse.......*cute*
customer_reviews.author: The Momster

customer_reviews.title: Good for small dogs and cats.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for sunbathing and summer time. In the pictures are my 8lbs poodle mixed and 6lbs poodle. Minus one star because of the narrow stairs, not functional so I added an additional dog steps on the side. We plan to take off the stairs and replace it with the steps.
customer_reviews.author: Teppitak

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend. Good quality and very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: My dog LOVES this and sleeps in it all the time. He's 21lbs and is just big enough to fit inside without sticking out. I put a cushion on the outside for when he wants to lay stretched out and that way he can rest his head sticking out. He can still fit inside without doing this. Would highly recommend. Good quality and very easy to assemble. Came in two days! I removed the ladder and placed a wooden shelf on its side for him to jump on to get to the top. He can't climb the ladder.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Tiny
customer_reviews.text: Very small my pup is less than 20lbs and looks huge on top and doesn't go inside. Stairs r useless Baxter just jumps up its so low to ground. Would be a great product if bigger and maybe a ramp or bigger steps
customer_reviews.author: R2

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This house was exactly what I was looking for to help my dog look out the window and enjoy the sunshine during the day while I'm at work. The stairs included with the house were far too steep for him to use so I bought the ramp other reviewers were mentioning and although its about an inch shorter than the house itself, it works perfectly. After painting and adding some decorations this was exactly what I had hoped it would be and my dog loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for our spoiled girl!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves it. We moved from a home with a three season porch where she always had protection from the elements if needed. She got caught in the rain and when I went to look for her she was in her little house! Sunny days she's on the deck.
customer_reviews.author: Rainstar

customer_reviews.title: I love it, its a little small for my small cocker spaniel
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I love it, its a little small for my small cocker spaniel (23lbs). He fits but not a lot of room, still he likes tight places so I thought why not. So far even thought the inside really is plenty big, he climbs into smaller places all the time he has yet to venture in. But I like, you need plenty of room for this though, I keep moving it around looking for the perfect spot. Good quality, easy to assemble. I read and saw where one purchasers didn't have such good luck but mine is great.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog House, but Unless Stairs!  Had to replace!
customer_reviews.text: The Housing has a great Design and build quality, but the Stairs are Absolutely Unless! Their too thin and too widely spaced for any small dog to use. My 10lbs Chihuahua Mix is a jumper and flies up and down the stairs of our home, but couldn't climb up these steps! Its a shame since she love the top deck. We had to remove the stairs and but another set Doggy stairs @ the local Petco to let her up there. Kinda of a Big Design Flaw if you ask me =-/
customer_reviews.author: Manny T

customer_reviews.title: Small.
customer_reviews.text: Looks a lot bigger in the pictures.... Other than that smelt great for days!! haha. I didnt feel like going through the return process after i put it together, So i kept it and glad i did, My dog loves it, even tho he is a little big for it.... (DOES NOT come with any blankets, or pads)
customer_reviews.author: nathan

customer_reviews.title: It's cute and all, but only a circus dog ...
customer_reviews.text: It's cute and all, but only a circus dog can climb the "steps". I place this at the bottom of my bed so that my bishon/miniature schnauzer mix (about the size of the dog pictured) could get into my high bed, but she just can't navigate the stairs. They are narrow, steep and too close together. I am going to have to modify the stairs somehow so that she can use them.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Singleton

customer_reviews.title: It was mostly pretty easy to install
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my cat. It was mostly pretty easy to install, but part of the upper railing wouldn't screw in right. She enjoyed the shade it provided in the summer, but when it rained, it leaked. I'd recommend weather proofing the house. I didn't get around to it, so instead I'd put down a piece of cardboard and rubber mat over the top. It looks ugly, but keeps the inside dry. Now it's winter and I'm concerned there might have been some rot damage. We'll see come spring. It was fine overall. It looks pretty cute as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty P

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great LARGE CAT condo.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this as a replacement cat condo for our large cat. She is 16 lbs and used to almost tip over her previous cat condo when she would climb it. this is very stable. She loves it. we have a fleece mat on top for padding. and the dogs like the lower level. It was easy to assemble. Lighter than most cat condos of size. Light weight. Very stable which was important. This unit has never so much as budged when she comes flying through the house and leaps onto it. If you looking for a cat condo for a large cat look at this.
customer_reviews.author: Kent

customer_reviews.title: GREAT...without the Stairs
customer_reviews.text: My 12 lb dog loves this house although he prefers the balcony (with a plush cushion purchased separately) so that he can look out the window. The only down side to this item is the stairs...they are way too narrow and steps themselves are small, closely spaced and slippery not to mention the poor design choice of having them assemble at a strange angle. Perhaps the stairs might work better for cats who are more agile. Luckily, my dog is big enough to jump up to the balcony himself but I suspect that as he ages, I'll have to invest in a ramp as others have done.
customer_reviews.author: Michigander

customer_reviews.title: Great indoor dog house
customer_reviews.text: While I love the piece, there are some "off" measurements. Meaning the workmanship is not evenly measured, and cut. When assembled there are noticeable differences, and uneven sections. My dog is terrified of the steps, and is still uneasy about going into the house section. She is now comfortable sitting on top when her bed is up there to watch people out the window. I am hoping she adapts soon! I will be changing, or modifying the steps ASAP. I think being able to see thru them makes it confusing, and unsettling for my dog (yes they are indeed narrow too). Overall I am happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Or spend the little extra and get something a little better rated in reviews
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this despite the many negative and mixed reviews. I was optimistic, but I must say, for the price, it really didn't meet my hopeful optimism. One of the steps on the stairway were received broken, due to the manufacturers installation fault. The house as a 'whole' will be all right for my indoor intention. But I was hoping for a bit of quality here for the pricing. I can't complain much as It was more a matter of time over money, but if you have the know how, build something yourself... Or spend the little extra and get something a little better rated in reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Cute and the cats love it.
customer_reviews.text: So adorable and my cats love it. I went over all the areas where the slats meet with a silicon caulk just for added protection against the elements (especially rain) since this was specifically for stray cats outside that I feed. It really stays dry on the interior, however I I assume the silicon halps. So I couldn't tell you how well it stays dry if that is not done since there does seem to be some space where moisture could get (as it is delivered) if not sealed properly. Overall cute and fairly sturdy and the cats love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan and Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Great product with a few drawbacks.
customer_reviews.text: My pups LOVE it! They lay in top all the time to look out the window. There are a few pros and cons tho! Pro: perfect size Nice look Can be painted Sturdy rooftop Cons: Small ladder for any dog to use Top walls are a bit flimsy
customer_reviews.author: Brandonn

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a month
customer_reviews.text: Not strong at all. It is already falling apart. My Yorkie didn't even use it since the steps are too steep to go down. And I have a teacup Yorkie. I wish I could get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Poca Rach

customer_reviews.title: Too small for my yorkie/poo.
customer_reviews.text: A bit small for my yorkie poo unfortunately. I've placed a pad just out front of the little house and his small bed and he'll lay on that but she rarely goes inside. I am hoping this summer she will show more interest especially in the hot weather. I plan to take it outdoors for her. The cat loves it, as I put a small cat bed on top and she sleeps there. Who knows, it may become a cat house instead!!
customer_reviews.author: doug

customer_reviews.title: Poorly design
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 4 pound yorkie so he could climb in bed with us. We have 6 dogs under 20 pounds. Each one could fit in the house no problem but this is where it makes no sense none of them could climb the steps. These steps are too narrow (6 " wide) too steep and the height between each one is too small. We fixed the problem by replacing the steps to a wider set and facing sideway. This is a nice looking house just poorly design not worth the trouble to send back and time consuming to fix it. I would consider it a good investment for indoor cats only.
customer_reviews.author: marie s

customer_reviews.title: Study, easy to assemble, just as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this dog house. Easy to assemble (took about 45-60 mins with 1 person). The stairs are definitely thin. I covered them with a thick blanket for now so it’s easier for my dog to jump up. Consider getting a ramp. Other than that the house is PERFECT. Will definitely paint it once the weather is warmer 😊
customer_reviews.author: VH

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. We have had this for 4 years now and it was one of the best purchases I’ve made. My dogs use it a ton and it was super easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: Very cute idea. However, we have had it ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute idea. However, we have had it since Christmas and our dog has not used it once. The way that the stairs are positioned doesnt allow him any room to climb up. We're still going to try and get him to use it, but it has been a process.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: SMALL BREEDS...NO TOY BREEDS... YES
customer_reviews.text: I read some of the reviews that indicated how small the dog house was but I thought I would give it a try myself since my dog is not very big. I have a small Shitzu-- and needless to say, the previous reviews were accurate! This is just way too small for my dog, so I will be sending it back! Nice concept, just not functional for SMALL breeds--it should maybe say for TOY breeds only.
customer_reviews.author: SM Chosen

customer_reviews.title: Great snake house
customer_reviews.text: Love this house. I made mine into a cozy hide for my snake when he goes out on the screened in porch which is usually all summer. I added a board behind the pet hole opening and then I made a small hole for him. I put in reprobate instead of a pad. He loves it and feels safe inside. I left the top unscrewed so I can easily access the inside in case I need to remove him. My cat uses the balcony to sun himself also.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgett

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This is clearly made of cedar wood and the odor of the cedar bothers one of my cats respiratory system because he has asthma and will not go in it. I think this summer I will put it outside in the fresh air and purchase some outdoor carpet and put it on the top of the pet house and inside. The wood is thin so I do not think it can weather the winter. In the meantime it is in the garage and the cats do not use it even to lay on the deck. Too bad, because it is cute and the manufacturer put together a well boxed item. Maybe in the summer outside will change their habits.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to buy this for my 5 lb. Pomeranian but was nervous because of the stairs. I didn't think he could climb them well. We already had dog stairs for him to climb on the couch and while putting the pet house together we put the dog stairs by it and sure enough, perfect fit. It doesn't look as nice as it does with the stairs it came with, but if you need the house for more practical purposes, another brand of dog stairs is a nice substitute. I only gave it 4 stars because of the flimsy stairs that came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Chewy and I love the Merry Pet Wood Room with a View.
customer_reviews.text: Love the looks & even though my little dog does not use the house, he is on the "patio" all the time by the window. Nothing was damaged and I put it together myself (81 year old female). Did not use the stairs (as suggested in one of the customer reviews) because they were too small, so ordered another set of steps from Amazon and they are doing just great. Have ordered 2 crate pads which fit just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was absolutely the cutest thing ever!
customer_reviews.text: This was absolutely the cutest thing ever! Everyone that comes over to my house is in love with it I wish it was made out of plastic and not wood though
customer_reviews.author: LeeAnn Withers

customer_reviews.title: I love this little house
customer_reviews.text: I love this little house. My dogs love it too. I agree with most of the reviews about the stairs, horrible stairs, but I just use the stairs I had purchased previously for them to get on the bed. My dachshund likes the railing on top to feel taller, and my puggle uses it as a chin rest. Great price and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Brit

customer_reviews.title: cute and great value
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute and my dog loves it! He is a 12 pound terrier and he seems to be the perfect size for it. He prefers the open top part to the closed bottom part but we placed it by the window so he can look out. All pieces were there and everything fit together perfectly- I saw other reviews that said certain parts weren't cut correctly but that wasn't the case with my order.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W.

customer_reviews.title: I got this at a great price and it is worth it
customer_reviews.text: I got this at a great price and it is worth it. Everything was package correctly, took 10 minutes to assemble. Looks great, is functional, not fond of the stairs, but for now works. I bout this for a 12.5 " at shoulder mini poodle. Updating now that I have had these (bought 2). I replaced the stairs dogs didn't like them. Best little dog houses, dog like them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: MommaO

customer_reviews.title: Cute and well made. Would have been a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute and well made. Would have been a bit easier to put together if there had been instructions with it. Not sure where the extra package of screws was supposed to be use. ;-) Had this a while now and my outside cat LOVES it. At first he would only sleep on the top but now, with colder weather, he curls up inside and keeps watch on the world.
customer_reviews.author: Valarie Delana

product_meta.title: Merry Pet Wood Pet House
product_meta.description:
Size:21" x 29" x 26"| Style:Wood Room with a ViewThis comfortable house with its beautiful lattice fence and stained brown cedar color will sit nicely on the deck or balcony of your home. The steps along the side of the house lead to a roof-top balcony where your pet can sun-bathe and play.

AMAZON.COM


WOOD ROOM WITH A VIEW PET HOUSE:
The Room with a View Pet House is an indoor/outdoor structure specially designed for smaller animals in your home. Constructed of kiln-dried wood treated with natural color stains to enhance its appearance and durability, the lower lounge area has a raised bottom to keep pets dry and features steps along the side of the house that lead to a rooftop balcony where your pet can sun-bathe and play.The construction is lightweight, easy to handle and has a calming, natural scent. The pet house includes simple instructions, with easily assembled, knock-down panels and a removable roof top for easy cleaning.

FEATURES AND SPECIFICATIONS:
- STABLE CELLULAR STRUCTURE OF WOOD WITHSTANDS HUMIDITY AND EXTREME TEMPERATURES
- INTRICATELY DESIGNED LATTICE FENCING
- NATURAL SCENT OF WOOD CREATES A CALMING AND PLEASANT ATMOSPHERE
- REMOVABLE ROOF TOP AND BOTTOM PANELS FOR EASY CLEANING
- MAY BE RE-STAINED LIKE ANY OTHER WOOD
- RAISED BOTTOM DESIGN KEEPS PETS DRY
- REMOVABLE ROOF TOP AND BOTTOM PANELS FOR EASY CLEANING
feature_bullets: Durable pet home ideal for indoor or outdoor use
Made from kiln-dried cedar and treated with natural color stains
Designed for smaller pets. Raised panel floor keeps your dog dry. Removable roof and bottom panels makes cleaning easy
Easy 20-minute assembly with included hardware and instructions
Includes balcony, latticework, and side steps

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
